solution_line_template: Addie put {Addie_total_stamps}/{fraction_denominator}=<<{Addie_total_stamps}/{fraction_denominator}={stamps_addie_put_in}>>{stamps_addie_put_in} stamps in the scrapbook
Parker now has {parker_initial_stamps}+{stamps_addie_put_in}=<<{parker_initial_stamps}+{stamps_addie_put_in}={parker_total_stamps}>>{parker_total_stamps} stamps in his scrapbook
